name: Bureaucrazy
description:
This Fall by the makers of Hobo Rampage and Dr. Kronenberg
  • A deep dive into bureaucratic madness.
  • Make friends and foes.
  • And don´t forget to fill in Form A
"Best game I ever played" - Random dude "I will never love another game like I love this one" - my Mom Meet the four riders of Bureaucrazy:


       
         
Wander trough billions two corridors, simply by clicking arrows.

Enter mysterious rooms, simply by clicking the door.

Engage in breathtaking conversations, who would have guessed, by clicking your preferred option.

"These controls are refreshingly simple" - Me
